explains: v. 吸引；（物体间）产生引力；引起；有吸引力
wordGroup: attract foreign investment 吸引外商投资；对外招商
attract investment 招商，招商引资

sentences.en: She tried to attract the waiter's attention.
sentences.cn: 她试图引起服务员的注意。

sentences.en: How can we attract more visitors to our website?
sentences.cn: 我们如何才能吸引更多人访问我们的网站呢？

sentences.en: She gave a little cough to attract my attention.
sentences.cn: 她轻轻地咳了一声以引起我的注意。
